title: Grilled Sardines
introduction: Grilled sardines, also known as Sarde alla Griglia, are a delightful dish that brings the taste of the Mediterranean to your table. Perfectly grilled and seasoned, these small fish are a feast for the senses and best enjoyed with a splash of lemon.
ingredients: 12 to 16 fresh sardines or smelts, cleaned
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Place a barbecue grill or broiler rack about 5 inches away from the heat source. Preheat a barbecue grill or broiler.

Pat the sardines dry and brush with the oil. Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper. Grill or broil the fish until nicely browned, about 3 minutes. Gently turn the fish over and cook until browned on the other side, about 2 to 3 minutes more.
Arrange the leaves on a platter. Top with the sardines and garnish with the lemon wedges. Serve hot.
